Name: market for heat, for reuse in municipal waste incineration only | heat, for reuse in municipal waste incineration only | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10903/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'heat, for reuse in municipal waste incineration only', in the Global geography. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;No transport or losses are considered in the modelling of this market, as producers and consumers are not physically separated.;The heat is produced in treatment activities and usually reused in the activity itself. Excess heat is fed in 'market for heat district or industrial, other than natural gas'.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'heat, for reuse in municipal waste incineration only',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  heat, for reuse in municipal waste incineration only', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
